channel.title: DedSec Blog
channel.description: Practical guides on privacy, security, and real-world tech — by DedSec Project.

item.title: AI & Cybersecurity 2026: Threats, Deepfakes, and Defenses | DedSec Blog
item.description: How AI changes cyber offense and defense: faster phishing, smarter malware tooling, improved detection, and the new operational and governance risks for teams in 2026.

item.title: Humanoid Robots & Artificial Muscles: Terminator vs Reality | DedSec Blog
item.description: A realistic look at “Terminator” fears: what autonomous systems can and can’t do today, how robot bodies are improving (actuators, muscles, hands), and where safety policy matters.

item.title: Digital ID & Social Credit (China + UK) | DedSec Blog
item.description: Digital identity can reduce fraud and simplify services—but it can also enable tracking and exclusion. Here’s how benefits, risks, and practical safeguards fit together.

item.title: Migration, Crime, and Demographic Change | DedSec Blog
item.description: How migration intersects with geopolitics: what “weaponization” narratives get right and wrong, and what resilient, rights-respecting policy looks like.

item.title: Watch Dogs vs Reality (All Games) | DedSec Blog
item.description: A grounded comparison between Watch Dogs’ fiction and today’s real surveillance, data brokers, smart-city systems, and cybercrime—what’s already here and what’s still sci‑fi.
